paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val30Met, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: TTR amyloid cardiomyopathy with ocular amyloidosis

individual_records.phenotype_details: TTR amyloid cardiomyopathy, vitreous opacities, chronic glaucoma
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 73‐year‐old Japanese man was transferred to our hospital with dyspnoea... Genetic analysis revealed Val30Met mutation (GTG → ATG), indicating a diagnosis of hereditary TTR amyloidosis.

functional_data.summary: The Val30Met mutation is associated with TTR amyloidosis, leading to cardiac and ocular manifestations.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and genetic analysis.
variants.additional_notes: The paper discusses the efficacy of tafamidis treatment in this patient.
key_quotes: Our case suggests that tafamidis may be effective in suppressing cardiac progression in TTR amyloid cardiomyopathy with Val30Met mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information on the TTR variant.
